name: Songs-of-The-Fallen-Races
description:
A Songs of the Fallen Race Mod
Inspired by Malazan Book of the Fallen series by Steven Erickson
Commissioned and managed by By Rake
Created by ArsGothica
id=2129044833


Hair, Eyebrows, and Facepaint from images are from the amazing RA mod

Compatibility:
Load before RA to get the pretty color pallet UI
Load last to get beards on custom heads and custome UI changes
Is compatible with all mods

Sotf Races uses head slots
Male Head Slots 666xx
female head slots  666xx



Be sure to check out these recommended mods
Ectomongers Set Creatures - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=190351847
Ectomongers Yog Creatures - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1908075921
Rp Aesthetics - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1542041983
